about_the_game:
Record multiple video and audio sources and bring them directly into the timeline. Correct your webcam shots for accurate color, or grade captured footage to create the perfect mood. Add effects and text to any scene and create your own personal intro animation.

Process your voice over for crystal clear sound or create sound effects with the perfect audio workflow. When you’re ready upload your video directly to social media or export your project using customizable render templates.

Highlights

Essential functions in VEGAS Edit 19 – Steam Edition:

  • Comprehensive screen capturing tool
  • Latest effects, filters, transitions & titles
  • Direct upload to YouTube & Vimeo
  • Audio synchronization for multicam editing
  • Green screen removal
  • GPU acceleration for decoding/encoding for Nvidia®, AMD® and Intel®
  • Multi-region motion tracking
  • Adjustment tracks
  • Professional format support
  • HDR color correction and grading
detailed_description:
New Version


About the Software

Record multiple video and audio sources and bring them directly into the timeline. Correct your webcam shots for accurate color, or grade captured footage to create the perfect mood. Add effects and text to any scene and create your own personal intro animation.

Process your voice over for crystal clear sound or create sound effects with the perfect audio workflow. When you’re ready upload your video directly to social media or export your project using customizable render templates.

Highlights

Essential functions in VEGAS Edit 19 – Steam Edition:

  • Comprehensive screen capturing tool
  • Latest effects, filters, transitions & titles
  • Direct upload to YouTube & Vimeo
  • Audio synchronization for multicam editing
  • Green screen removal
  • GPU acceleration for decoding/encoding for Nvidia®, AMD® and Intel®
  • Multi-region motion tracking
  • Adjustment tracks
  • Professional format support
  • HDR color correction and grading

name: VEGAS 19 Edit Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 6th Generation Intel Core i5 (or AMD equivalent) or better with 2.5 Ghz and 4 Cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX or GTX 9XX series or higher with 4GB • AMD/ATI® Radeon with 4GB and VCE 3.0 or higher (Radeon Pro series with 8GB for HDR and 32 bit projects)
  • Storage: 1.5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Video: BlackMagic RAW**, HEVC*/H.265, AVC/H.264, MP4, MPEG-2, MPEG-1, AVI, WMV, M4V, Sony XAVC / XAVC-S / XDCAM EX / HD 422 / MXF / ProDisc / HDCAM SR, MPEG IMX, DV, HDV, AVCHD, Panasonic P2, Red RAW *Only VEGAS Pro. **Currently in BETA Audio: AIFF, AAC, MP2, MP3, M4A, OGG Vorbis, WAV, WMA, FLAC Image: BMP, GIF, PNG, JPG, TIFF, DPX, OpenEXR, WDP, DNG Other: Premiere/After Effects (*.prproj), Final Cut Pro 7/ DaVinci Resolve (*.xml), Final Cut Pro X (*.fcpxml), EDL Text File (*.txt), Broadcast Wave Format, Closed Captioning (SRT) Resolutions: SD, HD, 4K, 8K
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: : 7th Generation Intel Core i7 (or AMD equivalent) or better with 3.0 Ghz and 8 Cores
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX or GTX 9XX series or higher with 4GB (8GB RTX series recommended for 8K) • AMD/ATI® Radeon with 4GB and VCE 3.0 or higher (Radeon Pro series with 8GB for HDR and 32 bit projects)
  • Storage: 1.5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Video: BlackMagic RAW**, HEVC*/H.265, AVC/H.264, MP4, MPEG-2, MPEG-1, AVI, WMV, M4V, Sony XAVC / XAVC-S / XDCAM EX / HD 422 / MXF / ProDisc / HDCAM SR, MPEG IMX, DV, HDV, AVCHD, Panasonic P2, Red RAW *Only VEGAS Pro. **Currently in BETA Audio: AIFF, AAC, MP2, MP3, M4A, OGG Vorbis, WAV, WMA, FLAC Image: BMP, GIF, PNG, JPG, TIFF, DPX, OpenEXR, WDP, DNG Other: Premiere/After Effects (*.prproj), Final Cut Pro 7/ DaVinci Resolve (*.xml), Final Cut Pro X (*.fcpxml), EDL Text File (*.txt), Broadcast Wave Format, Closed Captioning (SRT) Resolutions: SD, HD, 4K, 8K

short_description: VEGAS Edit 19 – Steam Edition comes with the editing tools you need to create engaging content like Let's plays, walkthroughs and gaming reviews. Achieve professional results while focusing on your story.
